problem.markdown:
>>The average American diet requires an energy subsidy of ___ calories for every calorie consumed.<< () 2 () 5 (x) 10 () 13 () 17
[explanation] The average American diet requires an energy subsidy of 10 calories for every calorie consumed. [explanation]
problem.p: The average American diet requires an energy subsidy of ___ calories for every calorie consumed.

choicegroup.label: The average American diet requires an energy subsidy of ___ calories for every calorie consumed.

div.p: The average American diet requires an energy subsidy of 10 calories for every calorie consumed.
